description.narrative: IR23: Healthy, Safe and gender-sensitive environments established in primary schools in at least 20 deprived districts, which contributes to Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 006 : Educational Quality and Outcomes of Pre-primary and Primary Schools Improved in 5 Focus Regions

description.narrative: Enhanced-School Health Programme concluded and lessons learned shared, especially relating to need for effective coordination and coherence across co-curricular interventions to promote school health and sexuality education among different actors. The Safe Schools Resource Pack to address bullying, corporal punishment, and sexual harassment completed and field tested. | Status:Met | As-of Date:21/12/2017
